section: This Agreement be deemed effective as of the Effective Date, Agreement and shall terminate on December 31, 2020, unless terminated earlier in accordance with Section 3.2.
explanation: There is structural flaw in the text that makes the section unclear. The text repeats the word Agreement. It seems as though there is a word missing or the text is just not written properly. There is no flow.

section: Provider agrees to provide the Services set forth on the Exhibit A attached hereto (as such Exhibit may be amended or supplemented pursuant to the terms of this Agreement, the "Exhibit") to Recipient for the respective periods and on the other terms and conditions set forth in this Agreement and in the Exhibit. However, Provider is not obligated to respond to any request by Recipient for access to any additional services and resources that are necessary for the operation of the Recipient and which are not currently contemplated in the Exhibit, unless Provider deems it fit and feasible.
explanation: This section sets out the services that provider must provide to the recipient. However, the section later says that the provider is not obligated to respond to any request by Recipient for access to any additional services and resources that are necessary for the operation of the Recipient and which are not currently contemplated in the Exhibit, unless Provider deems it fit and feasible. This is contradiction.

section: Provider shall allow the Recipient to use [ * * * ] at no cost, until December 31, 2021.
explanation: The term of the agreement ends on December 31, 2020 based on section 3.1. However, this section allows the recipient to use something until December 31, 2021. This is an inconsistency because the contract is terminated, but the recipient can still use this unknown object.
